item.description:
Part 1 of our Fall Speaker Series-

Ditching Your Boss?
Practical Steps to Starting Your Own Business

Six WBOA members share their expertise about business, marketing, finance and work/life balance.

Cost: FREE

Location: Western New England College Â 

Speakers: Allison Biggs, Ingrid Bredenberg

Taking the plunge from weekly paychecks and job security to the uncertain world of self employment can leave you feeling unsure of yourself, afraid of the unknown, and pressure not to fail. On top of that, how do you create a brand that shows the world what you do, and then how do you get your product or service in front of people? There are many exciting elements involved in starting a business and making your dreams come true. Hear from the women who have successfully made the transition, built better lives, and have never looked back.
item.how_to_find_us: The series will be held in the School of Business. Once in the building the gaurd will direct you to the correct room.
item.name: Fall Speaker Series- Building a Brand & Getting it in Front of People
